name: Blue-Eyes Shining Burst!
text: Tribute 1 monster whose original name is "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"; Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes Shining Dragon" from your hand or Deck, ignoring its Summoning condition, and, for the rest of the turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except for non-effect monsters. You can only activate "Blue-Eyes Shining Burst" once per turn.
